parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID of the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   ContainerGroup: elastic container instance
*   ImageCache: image cache
*   DataCache: data cache
*   VirtualNode: virtual node

parameters.name: Tag
parameters.description: The tags that you want to add to the resource. A maximum of 20 tags can be added to a resource.
